text: Hello, Camper ðŸ‘‹. My name is Camperbot. Click the buttons above to learn more about me...
I am your friendly assistant, and will help you with your work tasks.
My family are so proud for working with you, one of brightest blockchain developers of our time.
It brightens my every day to see that you have a massive reputation of 8.
Counting all the lit up LEDs, I can see that you have 100 tokens!
Seeing as 90 of these LEDs are greenish, that makes 90/100 of your tokens staked in your Proof of Stake blockchain.
I think you should stake more of your tokens to have a better chance of getting tasks. Click on one of the whiteish LEDs to stake it.
Being a robot, I can count the number of tokens you have very quickly. Click on my hat to get your account stats.
Oooo! Look, Camper! A green LED has turned reddish, and your server screen is flashing! You have a new task!
Let us click on the screen to see what task you have!
Hmm... A quiz. Looks like a hard one. I hope you get it correct so we get a reward.
Now that you submitted it, we will have to wait for other nodes to validate your submission.
So... weird weather we have been having.
Finally! Your answer has been validated.
Looks like it has been accepted, and added to the blockchain!
There is your reward! Another token, and more reputation!
That brings your total to... Wait! My senses are picking something up on the network...
What! Nooo! The network is being compromised! We are being hacked!
